class.name: InputEventMouse
class.brief_description: Base input event type for mouse events.
class.description: Stores general information about mouse events.

members.member: The mouse button mask identifier, one of or a bitwise combination of the [enum MouseButton] button masks.

When received in [method Node._input] or [method Node._unhandled_input], returns the mouse's position in the root [Viewport] using the coordinate system of the root [Viewport]. When received in [method Control._gui_input], returns the mouse's position in the [CanvasLayer] that the [Control] is in using the coordinate system of the [CanvasLayer].

When received in [method Node._input] or [method Node._unhandled_input], returns the mouse's position in the [Viewport] this [Node] is in using the coordinate system of this [Viewport]. When received in [method Control._gui_input], returns the mouse's position in the [Control] using the local coordinate system of the [Control].
